text: V takom sostoyanii v Sudnyy den' neveruyushchiy so strakhom sprosit svoyego Gospoda: "Gospodi! Kak zhe ya po Tvoyemu poveleniyu zabyl vse dovody, kotoryye mog by privesti v svoyo opravdaniye, i stoyu, kak slepoy, i so slepym razumom?! A prezhde, v blizhayshey zhizni, ya byl zryachim, sporil, dokazyval, opravdyvalsya i zashchishchal sebya
